actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for the printing of 3,500 copies of a revised edition of the Biographical Directory of the American Congress up to and including the Ninety-sixth Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing as a House document of a revised edition of the "Biographical Directory of the American Congress." Directs the printing of 3,500 additional copies of which 1,000 copies shall be for the use of the Senate, 2,200 copies for the House of Representatives, and 300 copies for the Joint Committee on Printing.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for the printing of 3,500 copies of a revised edition of the Biographical Directory of the American Congress up to and including the Ninety-sixth Congress.
